text: 5 Parametric vs. Non-Parametric Next to each of the methods below, state whether it is parametric or non-parametric (where n is the number of training examples and d is the number of features): 1. Histogram with 10 bins. 2. Decision tree learner of depth /n. 3. 10-nearest neighbours. 4. K-means with v/d means. 5. Density-based clustering. 6. Linear regression with polynomial basis of degree n. 7. Softmax multi-class classification (linear basis). 8. Robust PCA. 9. ISOMAP (with MDS to compute z;). 10. Deep neural network.
